name: GoZen Growth
author: GozenHQ

sections.description:
**Gozen is an outcome-driven all-in-one email marketing platform that helps businesses grow better.**

If you don’t have a Gozen account yet, you can signup for a FREE trial here.

This plugin allows you to tightly integrate your WordPress site with your Gozen account

What is included in the Gozen WordPress plugin – at a glance

CAMPAIGN OUTREACH

Create and personalize email campaigns to meet your specific needs. Choose from 25+ industry-specific email templates or use the drag-and-drop builder to design your own. There is built-in content customization for example: hello {{first_name}} and you can also schedule campaigns ahead of time.

AUDIENCE

Easily manage all of your contact lists in one place and filter them according to your preferences. Organize your email lists with sorting and filtering features. Manage your contacts systematically.

EMAIL TEMPLATE LIBRARY

A massive library of over 700 personalized email templates for all of your email marketing needs. This contains HTML as well as plain text templates. simply import a template from the template library, and modify the content as needed for your campaign.

ANALYTICS AND REPORT TRACKING

Keep track of all of your account data in one place. Get real-time updates on average click-through rate, open rate, email bounce rate, and engagement.

contact engagement: Total contacts, total active subscribers, Unsubscribers, Bounced

Campaign engagement: Total Open rate, Clicked Rate, Abused Report Rate, Top clicked links

CAMPAIGN OUTREACH

Create and personalize email campaigns to meet your specific needs. Choose from 25+ industry-specific email templates or use the drag-and-drop builder to design your own. There is built-in content customization for example: hello {{first_name}} and you can also schedule campaigns ahead of time.

POPUP FORMS

Generate more leads and create a customer mailing list using our sign-up forms. Use pre-made templates and embed them on your website — no design or development skills are required.

Attract Visitors’ Attention – Show visitors what they require – at the right time and in the right place.

Increase Conversion Rate – Persuade visitors to perform the appropriate actions and help your business achieve its goals.

Expand Your Email List – Displaying popups can help you capture more visitors and expand your email list.

Gather Feedback – Learn what your website visitors think about your brand and store.

SEAMLESS INTEGRATIONS WITH TOP PLATFORMS

Below mentioned are the integrations and webhooks Gozen plugin supports,

  • Shopify
  • Woocommerce
  • Aweber
  • Squarespace
  • Mailchimp
  • Optinly

GOZEN OUTCOME-DRIVEN EMAIL MARKETING TOOL IS USED BY

Gozen is an Outcome-Driven Email Marketing Solution Personalized For Every Industry Boost Sales, Increase Customer Value, and Grow Your Business With the Most Affordably Priced Email Marketing Software Customized To Every Industry

Let’s look at some of the businesses and professionals who can benefit from the Gozen WordPress popup form plugin.

  • Bloggers
  • Entrepreneurs
  • Saas companies
  • Marketers
  • Realtors
  • eCommerce Store Owners
  • Journalists
  • Health Sector
  • Web Developers
  • Educational institutions
  • Creative Agencies
  • Food Bloggers
  • Startups

Put in a few words, for any business that wants to develop their business through email marketing Gozen is an ideal WordPress email marketing tool

PLUGIN SUPPORT

To get support, please send an email to support@gozengrowth.com, we will be happy to help you!
